title: Nez Perce National Historical Park: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations               Permits & Reservations       Reservations are needed for the group picnic area at the Spalding site in Spalding, Idaho. Tour and school groups who would like to interact with the park rangers also need to make a reservation. For Spalding, please call (208) 843-7010 and Big Hole at (406) 689-3151, ext. 1023.
